title: HONOR 5 TOKENS
body:
Hello fellas, I just got the Honor 5 caspsule this season which had inside 2 honor 5 tokens (I didn´t even know they existed).

I received Medieval Twich last year in a random honor capsule. 

**My doubt is about getting the Grey Warwick skin chroma: if I get it, will I also have the skin or i need it?**

Since we are said these tokens don´t expire, I think it is more worth to wait next season and see what rewards we are given.


What do you think? 

PD: see the screenshot for more info.

Thank you!!!
